function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Continuous spread of the virus","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Supply chain complications and logistic bottlenecks","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Workforce issues and labor shortage","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Projects necessary for the delivery of health care services, such as hospitals, health-care facilities, and pharmaceutical manufacturing facilities.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transportation projects, including bridges, roadwork, and highways.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Affordable-housing residential projects.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Supply chain challenges and workforce shortages","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to comprehend the problems associated with the coronavirus","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unprecedented changes and responses to business, economic, and social aspects due to the pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variation in the effects of the pandemic on the construction sector based on state suggestions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty about the severity and duration of the crisis","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges faced by construction industry stakeholders due to covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of clear guidance on best practices for construction industry recovery","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Confusion and uncertainty about dealing with the pandemic on construction jobsites","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of the pandemic on the construction industry","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of definite construction-related guidelines and best practices for pandemic management","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases in the construction industry","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic impact of business failures in the construction industry","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unemployment and labor availability in the construction industry","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruption to construction projects due to covid-19 prevention measures and delays.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic and legal challenges for construction entities due to prolonged disruptions and stricter prevention measures.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate compliance with safety steps, job-site hygiene, social distancing, and personal protective equipment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of adherence to cdc, osha, and state regulations and guidelines","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to provide adequate site-specific safety plans","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Labor shortages due to illness and quarantine of construction workers leading to project delays and cancellations.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Construction workforce concerns about working in close proximity at the end of projects due to covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduced workforce and site-supervision workers leading to increased risk of infections","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shrinking workforce crew size due to the pandemic leading to less group activities and more defined procedures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Absence of worker protections such as sick leave and paid time off","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic difficulties caused by covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"New generation generation c emerging due to the pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of clarity in the application of sick leave policies for construction workers, especially those paid on a daily basis","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exclusion of construction workers from the formal economy from sick leave benefits, leading to vulnerability during disease outbreaks","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of increased disease transmission due to shared housing arrangements for construction workers","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Workers being in close proximity to each other","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficulty in finding open hotels","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of control over hotel cleanliness standards","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Work suspensions, shut downs, or slowdowns due to covid-19 measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of on-site operations and increase in offsite construction","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contracting at significantly lower margins and lack of in-depth investigation into bidding decisions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of parking around job sites in urban areas","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of pandemic on demand for project types","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in demand for healthcare facilities due to pandemic","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential exposure to coronavirus on construction sites due to close proximity of workers","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decreased demand for construction projects due to unemployment and low growth","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Project delays due to pandemic and government-mandated closures, delays in shipments of materials and equipment, challenges finding workers, and smaller work crews due to social distancing requirements.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Anticipation of future business impact, structural and financial.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Longer project completion times due to safety changes, reduced on-site workforce, and time constraints for new construction projects.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased risk of isolation and loneliness due to remote work and telecommuting practices","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rise of new technologies for real-time tracking of employee health and covid-19 symptoms","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"}]}
